## localization-utilities package

Some utilities for working with Rush Stack localization files.

## Classes

<table><thead><tr><th>

Class


</th><th>

Description


</th></tr></thead>
<tbody><tr><td>

[TypingsGenerator](./localization-utilities.typingsgenerator.md)


</td><td>

This is a simple tool that generates .d.ts files for .loc.json, .resx.json, .resjson, and .resx files.


</td></tr>
</tbody></table>
